sentences.sContent: Married couples spend more time eating together, sit in front of the TV more and often order takeaway ready meals while exercising less.
sentences.sContent_eng: Married couples spend more time eating together, sit in front of the TV more and often order takeaway ready meals while exercising less.
sentences.sCn: 调查发现，已婚夫妇一起吃饭、坐著看电视的时间增多，他们经常叫外卖，同时锻鍊次数减少。

words.tran: 外卖的，供顾客带出外吃的
外卖；（桥牌中）示意搭档改叫的叫牌

trans.tranOther: a meal that you buy at a shop or restaurant to eat at home
